getAtomicNumber

public static int getAtomicNumber(java.lang.String symbol)
Returns the atomic number of the element specified by its symbol. Case insensitive.

Parameters:
symbol - atom symbol e.g. "C", "Br".
Returns:
atomic number or -1 if not found.
